title: Inbound tourism in Qatar from 2013 to 2022
summary: Overall Number of arrivals in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of arrivals in millions is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Number of arrivals in millions, of value 1.8 was reached at Year 2017
The lowest Number of arrivals in millions, of value 1.4 was reported at Year 2015
